c:attribute.name: panid
c:attribute.description: The PANID in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: extid
c:attribute.description: The extended PANID in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: channel
c:attribute.description: The channel in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: power
c:attribute.description: The transmit power in use by the Zigbee chip

c:attribute.name: powermode
c:attribute.description: The power mode used by the Zigbee chip

c:attribute.name: profile
c:attribute.description: The stack profile in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: security
c:attribute.description: The security level in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: supportednwks
c:attribute.description: The number of supported Zigbee networks

c:attribute.name: joining
c:attribute.description: True if the Zigbee network is allowing joins, false otherwise

c:attribute.name: updateid
c:attribute.description: The NWK update id in use by the Zigbee network

c:attribute.name: eui64
c:attribute.description: The EUI64 of the Zigbee chip

c:attribute.name: tceui64
c:attribute.description: The EUI64 of the Zigbee network's trust center

c:attribute.name: uptime
c:attribute.description: The amount of time since the last Zigbee chip reset

c:attribute.name: manufacturer
c:attribute.description: The Zigbee manufacturer code of the Zigbee chip

c:attribute.name: pendingPairing
c:attribute.description: Devices that use link-keys/install codes that have NOT joined the network. This is a super-set of the hubkit:pendingPairing.

c:method.name: Reset
c:method.description: Perform a reset of the Zigbee chip

c:parameter.name: type
c:parameter.description: The type of reset to be performed

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: True if the reset was initiated, false otherwise.

c:method.name: Scan
c:method.description: Perform an environment scan using the Zigbee chip

c:return.name: scans
c:return.description: The configuration values in use by the Zigbee chip.

c:method.name: GetConfig
c:method.description: Get the Zigbee chip configuration information

c:return.name: config
c:return.description: The configuration values in use by the Zigbee chip.

c:method.name: GetStats
c:method.description: Get the current low-level statistics tracked by the Zigbee chip

c:return.name: stats
c:return.description: The current statistics as maintained by the Zigbee bridge.

c:method.name: GetNodeDesc
c:method.description: Get the node descriptor of a node in the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: nwk
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node.

c:return.name: desc
c:return.description: The node descriptor of the node.

c:method.name: GetActiveEp
c:method.description: Get the active endpoints of a node in the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: nwk
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node.

c:return.name: endpoints
c:return.description: The set of active endpoints on the node.

c:method.name: GetSimpleDesc
c:method.description: Get the simple descriptor of a node in the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: nwk
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node.

c:parameter.name: ep
c:parameter.description: The endpoint identifier on the node.

c:return.name: desc
c:return.description: The simple descriptor of the node's endpoint.

c:method.name: GetPowerDesc
c:method.description: Get the power descriptor of a node in the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: nwk
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node.

c:return.name: desc
c:return.description: The power description of the node.

c:method.name: Identify
c:method.description: Identify a node in the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: eui64
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node to be identified.

c:parameter.name: duration
c:parameter.description: The network address of the node to be identified.

c:method.name: Remove
c:method.description: Remove a node from the Zigbee network

c:parameter.name: eui64
c:parameter.description: The EUI64 of the node to be removed.

c:method.name: FactoryReset
c:method.description: Factory reset the Zigbee stack, removing all paired devices in the process.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: True if the reset was initiated, false otherwise.

c:method.name: FormNetwork
c:method.description: Restore the Zigbee network to an exact state.

c:parameter.name: eui64
c:parameter.description: The eui64 to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: panId
c:parameter.description: The panid to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: extPanId
c:parameter.description: The extended panid to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: channel
c:parameter.description: The channel to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: nwkkey
c:parameter.description: The base64 encoded network key to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: nwkfc
c:parameter.description: The network frame counter to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: apsfc
c:parameter.description: The aps frame counter to use for the restored hub

c:parameter.name: updateid
c:parameter.description: The updateid to use for the restored hub

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: True if the reset was initiated, false otherwise.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: True if the restore was initiated, false otherwise.

c:method.name: NetworkInformation
c:method.description: Get information about the current state of the network.

c:return.name: routing
c:return.description: The current routing table per node.

c:return.name: route
c:return.description: The current route used by the controller per node.

c:method.name: PairingLinkKey
c:method.description: Pairs a device using a pre-shared link key.

c:parameter.name: euid
c:parameter.description: ASCII Hex encoded EUID of the device to pair.

c:parameter.name: linkkey
c:parameter.description: ASCII Hex encodeed preshared link key of the device to pair.

c:parameter.name: timeout
c:parameter.description: The amount of time in milliseconds for which the place will be able to add devices

c:method.name: PairingInstallCode
c:method.description: Pairs a device using a pre-shared install code.

c:parameter.name: euid
c:parameter.description: ASCII Hex encoded EUID of the device to pair.

c:parameter.name: installcode
c:parameter.description: ASCII Hex encodeed install code of the device to pair.

c:parameter.name: timeout
c:parameter.description: The amount of time in milliseconds for which the place will be able to add devices

c:method.name: ClearPendingPairing
c:method.description: Clears out pending pairing devices. Ineffects stops the background pairing for linked key devices.
